languages.text: "Прочие же были моими голосами. Юный Антоний — младший, только занял место в хоре. Когда стало тяжко, его охватил ужас, а я... разгневался на эту слабость, подчинил разум Антония и принудил его истратить все жизненные силы на обряд. Аннис рок настиг еще раньше: она одна сказала мне перед хором, что ритуал — безумие. В гневе я велел {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}сервиторизировать{/g} ее — я верил, что авторитет надо защищать. Она умерла здесь, где вы стоите. Кажется, она все понимала..." {n}На измаранной красным повязке хормейстера проступают все новые алые капли.{/n} "Все мои голоса... Я помню имя каждого, кого сгубил в этих стенах".

traits.locale_text: "Прочие же были моими голосами. Юный Антоний — младший, только занял место в хоре. Когда стало тяжко, его охватил ужас, а я... разгневался на эту слабость, подчинил разум Антония и принудил его истратить все жизненные силы на обряд. Аннис рок настиг еще раньше: она одна сказала мне перед хором, что ритуал — безумие. В гневе я велел {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}сервиторизировать{/g} ее — я верил, что авторитет надо защищать. Она умерла здесь, где вы стоите. Кажется, она все понимала..." {n}На измаранной красным повязке хормейстера проступают все новые алые капли.{/n} "Все мои голоса... Я помню имя каждого, кого сгубил в этих стенах".

languages.text: "The rest were my voices. Antonius was the youngest. He had been in the Choir for only a short while. When the situation turned dire, fear got the best of him, and I... was infuriated by his weakness. I dominated Antonius's mind and impelled him to use up every spark of his life force for the ritual. Annis's doom came even earlier. She was the one person who told me, in front of the Choir, that the ritual was madness. In my anger, I ordered her {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitorised{/g}. I believed I had to protect my authority. She died on the spot where you're standing now. I think she was still aware..." {n}More scarlet drops seep through the Choirmaster's red-stained blindfold.{/n} "All my voices... I remember the name of each one whose life I cut short within these walls."
languages.original_text: "Прочие же были моими голосами. Юный Антоний — младший, только занял место в хоре. Когда стало тяжко, его охватил ужас, а я... разгневался на эту слабость, подчинил разум Антония и принудил его истратить все жизненные силы на обряд. Она умерла здесь, где вы стоите. Кажется, она все понимала..." {n}На измаранной красным повязке хормейстера проступают все новые алые капли.{/n} "Все мои голоса... Я помню имя каждого, кого сгубил в этих стенах".

traits.locale_text: "The rest were my voices. Antonius was the youngest. He had been in the Choir for only a short while. When the situation turned dire, fear got the best of him, and I... was infuriated by his weakness. I dominated Antonius's mind and impelled him to use up every spark of his life force for the ritual. Annis's doom came even earlier. She was the one person who told me, in front of the Choir, that the ritual was madness. In my anger, I ordered her {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitorised{/g}. I believed I had to protect my authority. She died at the spot where you're standing now. I think she was still aware..." {n}More scarlet drops seep through the Choirmaster's red-stained blindfold.{/n} "All my voices... I remember the name of each one whose life I cut short within these walls."

"The rest were my voices. Anthony was the youngest. He had been in the choir for only a short while. When things got very difficult, I... sucked all the life force out of him. Devoured him like a monster. Annis's doom had come even earlier. She had been the one person who told me, in front of the choir, that the ritual was madness. In my anger, I had her servitored. I believed one had to protect one's authority. She died at the spot you are standing on. I think she understood..." {n}More scarlet drops seep through the Choirmaster's red-stained blindfold.{/n} "All my voices... I remember the name of each one whose life I cut short within these walls."

I remember the name of each one whose life I cut short within these walls."

languages.text: «Los demás eran mis voces. Antonius era el más joven. Llevaba muy poco tiempo en el Coro. Cuando la situación se volvió desesperada, el miedo le superó, y... su debilidad me enfureció. Dominé su mente y le empujé a usar hasta la última chispa de su fuerza vital en el ritual. El final de Annis llegó incluso antes. Fue la única persona que me dijo, delante de todo el Coro, que el ritual era una locura. La furia me llevó a ordenar que la {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servidorizaran{/g}. Creí que tenía que proteger mi autoridad. Murió exactamente donde está usted ahora. Creo que aún estaba consciente...». {n}Más gotas escarlatas atraviesan la venda roja que rodea los ojos del maestro del Coro.{/n} «Todas mis voces... Recuerdo el nombre de todos cuyas vidas destruí entre estos muros».

I believed I had to protect my authority. She died on the spot where you're standing now. I remember the name of each one whose life I cut short within these walls."

Creo que aún estaba consciente...». {n}Más gotas escarlatas atraviesan la venda roja que rodea los ojos del maestro del Coro.{/n} «Todas mis voces... Recuerdo el nombre de todos cuyas vidas destruí entre estos muros».

languages.text: 「残りは私の声です。一番若かったのはアントニウス。彼は聖歌隊に入って間もなかった。緊迫した状況になったとき、彼は恐怖に支配され、私は…その弱さにカッとなってしまった。アントニウスの精神を支配し、儀式のためにその生命力の輝きすべてを使い果たすよう強制したのです。アニスの運命の日はもっと早くやってきました。彼女は聖歌隊の前で、私に儀式が異常だと言った唯一の人間でした。私は怒りにまかせて、彼女を{g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}サーヴィター化{/g}するように命じました。自分の威厳を守らなければならないと思い込んでいたのです。彼女は、今あなたが立っている場所で命を落としました。きっとまだ、意識はあったことでしょう…」{n}クワイアーマスターの紅く染まった目隠しから、さらに緋色の雫が染みる。{/n}「私の全ての声…この壁の中で殺した名前は、ひとり残らず覚えています」
languages.original_text: "The rest were my voices. Antonius was the youngest. He had been in the Choir for only a short while. When the situation turned dire, fear got the best of him, and I... was infuriated by his weakness. I dominated Antonius's mind and impelled him to use up every spark of his life force for the ritual. Annis's doom came even earlier. She was the one person who told me, in front of the Choir, that the ritual was madness. In my anger, I ordered her {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitorised{/g}. I believed I had to protect my authority. She died on the spot where you're standing now. I think she was still aware..." {n}More scarlet drops seep through the Choirmaster's red-stained blindfold.{/n} "All my voices... I remember the name of each one whose life I cut short within these walls."

languages.text: “剩下的都是我的学徒。安东尼是最年轻的学徒，加入唱诗班的时间也非常短。当情况开始失控时，他被恐惧吞噬了，而我……我对他的软弱怒不可遏。我控制了安东尼的思想，逼迫他耗尽所有力量来完成那场仪式。而安妮丝的劫难来得更早，她是唯一一个敢于发声的人。她当着整个唱诗班的面告诉我，说这个仪式简直是疯了。于是我一怒之下，命令把她改造成{g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}机仆{/g}，因为我认为我必须维护我自己的权威。她死的地方就是您现在站着的地方，她死的时候，意识应该还是清醒的……”{n}唱诗大师染红的眼罩里渗出了更多殷红的血泪。{/n}“那些学徒……每个被我杀害的人，他们的名字我都记得。”
languages.original_text: "The rest were my voices. Antonius was the youngest. He had been in the Choir for only a short while. When the situation turned dire, fear got the best of him, and I... was infuriated by his weakness. I dominated Antonius's mind and impelled him to use up every spark of his life force for the ritual. Annis's doom came even earlier. She was the one person who told me, in front of the Choir, that the ritual was madness. In my anger, I ordered her {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitorised{/g}. I believed I had to protect my authority. She died on the spot where you're standing now. I think she was still aware..." {n}More scarlet drops seep through the Choirmaster's red-stained blindfold.{/n} "All my voices... I remember the name of each one whose life I cut short within these walls."

languages.text: "Der Rest waren meine Stimmen. Antonius war der Jüngste. Er war erst seit Kurzem Mitglied des Chors. Als sich die Lage verschlechterte, wurde er von Angst erfasst und ich ... geriet angesichts seiner Schwäche in Wut. Also übernahm ich Antonius' Verstand und trieb ihn an, jeden Funken seiner Lebensenergie für das Ritual zu verwenden. Annis' Ende kam noch früher. Sie hatte mir als Einzige vor dem versammelten Chor gesagt, das Ritual wäre Irrsinn. In meiner Wut ordnete ich ihre {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}Servitorisierung{/g} an. Ich glaubte, meine Autorität wahren zu müssen. Sie starb an der Stelle, an der Ihr jetzt steht. Ich glaube, Sie war noch bei Bewusstsein ..." {n}Rote Tropfen sickern durch die blutgetränkte Augenbinde des Chormeisters.{/n} "Alle meine Stimmen ... Ich weiß noch die Namen aller, deren Leben ich innerhalb dieser Wände beendet habe."
languages.original_text: "The rest were my voices. Antonius was the youngest. He had been in the Choir for only a short while. When the situation turned dire, fear got the best of him, and I... was infuriated by his weakness. I dominated Antonius's mind and impelled him to use up every spark of his life force for the ritual. Annis's doom came even earlier. She was the one person who told me, in front of the Choir, that the ritual was madness. In my anger, I ordered her {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitorised{/g}. I believed I had to protect my authority. She died on the spot where you're standing now. I think she was still aware..." {n}More scarlet drops seep through the Choirmaster's red-stained blindfold.{/n} "All my voices... I remember the name of each one whose life I cut short within these walls."

traits.locale_text: "Der Rest waren meine Stimmen. Antonius war den Jüngste. Er war erst seit Kurzem Mitglied des Chors. Als sich die Lage verschlechterte, wurde er von Angst erfasst und ich ... geriet angesichts seiner Schwäche in Wut. Also übernahm ich Antonius' Verstand und trieb ihn an, jeden Funken seiner Lebensenergie für das Ritual zu verwenden. Annis' Ende kam noch früher. Sie hatte mir als Einzige vor dem versammelten Chor gesagt, das Ritual wäre Irrsinn. In meiner Wut ordnete ich ihre {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}Servitorisierung{/g} an. Ich glaubte, meine Autorität wahren zu müssen. Sie starb an der Stelle, an der Ihr jetzt steht. Ich glaube, Sie war noch bei Bewusstsein ..." {n}Rote Tropfen sickern durch die blutgetränkte Augenbinde des Chormeisters.{/n} "Alle meine Stimmen ... Ich weiß noch die Namen aller, deren Leben ich innerhalb dieser Wände beendet habe."

languages.text: « Quant aux autres, c'étaient mes propres voix. Antonius était le plus jeune. Il avait rejoint le chœur depuis peu de temps. Quand la situation a dégénéré, la peur a eu raison de lui, et je... sa faiblesse m'a rendu fou furieux. J'ai pris le contrôle de son esprit et je l'ai poussé à épuiser jusqu'à la dernière étincelle de sa force vitale pour alimenter le rituel. La mort d'Annis est survenue encore plus tôt. C'est elle qui m'a mis en garde quant aux dangers du rituel, et ce, devant le chœur tout entier. Fou de rage qu'elle ose contester mon autorité, j'ai donné l'ordre de la {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitoriser{/g}. Elle est morte à l'endroit précis où vous vous tenez actuellement. Je crois bien qu'elle était encore consciente... » {n}De nouvelles larmes écarlates suintent à travers le bandeau ensanglanté du maître de chœur.{/n} « Toutes mes voix... Je me souviens des noms de tous les malheureux dont j'ai abrégé les jours entre ces murs. »
languages.original_text: "The rest were my voices. Antonius was the youngest. He had been in the Choir for only a short while. When the situation turned dire, fear got the best of him, and I... was infuriated by his weakness. I dominated Antonius's mind and impelled him to use up every spark of his life force for the ritual. Annis's doom came even earlier. She was the one person who told me, in front of the Choir, that the ritual was madness. In my anger, I ordered her {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitorised{/g}. I believed I had to protect my authority. She died on the spot where you're standing now. I think she was still aware..." {n}More scarlet drops seep through the Choirmaster's red-stained blindfold.{/n} "All my voices... I remember the name of each one whose life I cut short within these walls."

Je crois bien qu'elle était encore consciente... » {n}De nouvelles larmes écarlates suintent à travers le bandeau ensanglanté du maître de chœur.{/n} « Toutes mes voix... Je me souviens des noms de tous les malheureux dont j'ai abrégé les jours entre ces murs. »

languages.text: "Geri kalan seslerse çıraklarımdı. Antonius, aralarından en genciydi. Koro'ya katılmasının üzerinden çok geçmemişti. Durum ciddileştiğinde korkusuna yenik düştü ve ben... Zayıflığı karşısında öfkeye kapıldım. Antonius'un zihnini ele geçirerek onu ayin için yaşam gücünün her bir zerresini kullanmaya zorladım. Annis'in sonu ise çok daha önce geldi. Tüm Koro'nun önünde bana ayinin delilik olduğunu söyleyen bir tek oydu. Öfkeye kapılarak onun {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}hizmetörleştirilmesini{/g} emrettim. Otoritemi korumam gerektiğine inanıyordum. Şu an sizin durduğunuz yerde öldü. Sanırım bunun hâlâ farkında..." {n}Koro Şefi'nin kırmızıya bulanmış göz bandından daha fazla kızıl damla sızıyor.{/n} "Tüm seslerim... Bu duvarlar arasında vaktinden önce gitmesine sebep olduğum her birinin ismini hatırlıyorum."
languages.original_text: "The rest were my voices. Antonius was the youngest. He had been in the Choir for only a short while. When the situation turned dire, fear got the best of him, and I... was infuriated by his weakness. I dominated Antonius's mind and impelled him to use up every spark of his life force for the ritual. Annis's doom came even earlier. She was the one person who told me, in front of the Choir, that the ritual was madness. In my anger, I ordered her {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitorised{/g}. I believed I had to protect my authority. She died on the spot where you're standing now. I think she was still aware..." {n}More scarlet drops seep through the Choirmaster's red-stained blindfold.{/n} "All my voices... I remember the name of each one whose life I cut short within these walls."
